paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant Q658X, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The overall tumor incidence was 82% in brca2+/+;tp53+/m zebrafish.
The overall tumor incidence was 100% in brca2 m/m;tp53+/m zebrafish.

functional_data.summary: The brca2Q658X mutation is a nonsense mutation that leads to loss of function.

variants.segregation_data: The brca2Q658X mutation segregates with malignant tumor development in zebrafish.
variants.additional_notes: The study indicates that the brca2Q658X mutation significantly influences tumorigenesis in zebrafish.
key_quotes: The brca2 mutation status influenced the age at tumor onset, tumor number, and tumor type.
The overall tumor incidence was 82% in brca2+/+;tp53+/m zebrafish, 91% in brca2+/m;tp53+/m zebrafish, and 100% in brca2 m/m;tp53+/m zebrafish.

tables_processed.table_caption: Tumor incidence in zebrafish with different brca2 and tp53 genotypes.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the BRCA2 variant.
